attributes.action: Ensure that Live television coverage of National Team Sports are on "non pay" services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are so many major sporting events that include our National Teams (England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland) being transmitted only on "Pay Tv" services.(Satellite and Cable)

If our National Teams are involved in major world competitions, Live Television coverage should not be broadcast only on "Pay TV"

The current cricket world cup is a great example of this, live coverage is only available on subscription services.

If a National team is funded by the Tax payer, surely the right to watch them Live on "Non Pay" television should apply. 

Our National Teams belong to the Realm and the public not Television broadcasters
